title: I CANT LOGIN
body: I'm from korea only I cant login??~~~~

replies.body:
Login issues are often caused by certain Internet Explorer security settings or network configurations that prevent the link from happening. I recommend working through our consolidated list of common solutions in our [Login Issues guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
